entry.title: Lightning Talks
entry.summary:
Description

Lightning talks! 5 minutes! GO!

  • Why would a journalist want to learn Python? — Philip Nye
  • Story detection using LDAs — Hendrik Heuer
  • A model may be right, but irrelevant — Maria Koroliuk
  • Why I love the days I get to optimise things — Gemma Hentsch
  • Ethics? & Data Science ... — Roelof Pieters
  • Love letter to Russel Winder — Tony Simpson
  • Let's go to Mars — Juan Luis Cano
  • Testing with Hypothesis — David McGiver
  • Introducing (Plotly) Widgets — Carole Griffiths

... DONE!

entry.title: Why I have an unhealthy love of tests
entry.summary:
Summary

Why I have an unhealthy love of tests, and why you shouldn't be scared about writing them

Description

Tests, I used to hate them, and actually when I start writing tests on a new project I still do.

But, you don't have to be scared about them, and I'd like to cover developing your testing strategy, what to test, what not to test, and how to explain how to convince higher ups that its not just a useful spending of time, its a vital part of your job.
